ygData.subject: Quasar

Quickstrike:




Quickstrike nodded again to Black Arachnia and did what she said. He 
connected the wire to her hip and then connected the other side to 
the pod. He back up back over to Black Arachnia. He swore if this 
didn't work he was going to kill the spark. He wasn't going to lose 
her because an this worthless spark---that was half of his.

He stood by her waiting for something to happen, when it did. The pod 
came on-line when it seemingly looked dead. The scanner probe even 
erected. Quickstrike cocked a brow at it.

He ducked and squinted his optics when the scanner flashed in his 
face. The fan rotated and shrunk down back in its place. 

He stared at the pod with wide optics as the hull of it opened. Out 
stepped a slender bot---with his markings and coloring. Holy slag, it 
was his daughter. A stupid bot would have passed out by now, but not 
him. He just stared at her.

She was was no taller than both of them, with a slim face, wide 
curving crimson optics, and a silver mouth plate that went from a 
covered chin to a few inches under her optics. She had a slender 
figure, like Black Arachnia's, even with those spider legs mounted 
behind her arms. Her legs were gold and silver with gray feet. On 
both her thighs were black holsters equipted with a gun. 

She stared at both of them.


(Fact: Quasar is named after a rescued horse.)
